_sText:
Large waterfall made by request.  

You will need to tie the large brush textured with trigger into env_embers with these keyvalues;

angles 90 0 0
particletype 1
density 256
lifetime 1
speed 169
rendercolor 147 164 172
spawnflags 1

if you want to change the speed of the waterfall you will need to change the scroll rate in the VMT but i think the speed is fine.

displacements still a bit messy but dint want to do much so u can personalize it yourself after sewing it in.

just put the folder gg_oasis in cstrike\materials and the folder ken in sourcesdk\bin\ep1\bin\prefabs
